title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.10 - Conduct of hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.10 - Conduct of hearings

State Regulations

All hearings shall be conducted in an impartial, efficient, timely, expert, and fair manner. The hearing officer shall be responsible for
the conduct of a hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
2.10

Adopted

New

York State Register March 25, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 12, eff. 3/25/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
